name: Milk and Cookies
description:
What better way to spend some free time than with Milk and Cookies?
Have fun going through amazing levels, cute graphics, different doors and environments. New puzzle challenges await at every step of the way. Even enemies! Find a way to beat Little Jhonny and Angry Bob. Your main goal is to reunite milk and cookies of course :3
If you like physics and yummy snacks, then this is a game for you.
We all know they’re made for each other, so help them get back together :D
The gameplay is addictive, dynamic and satisfying.
There are also a lot of characters to unlock!


In the upcoming updates, we will include new doors, levels, and a shop of endless customization fun.
The sandbox door will also be available, and you will be able to create your own levels for others and yourself to play!
Compete with others, see who can get a higher score!
